players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I believe we should focus on identifying the mafia among us. Given what happened last night, I think it's crucial that we work together to uncover any suspicious behavior."

Diana: "I will remain silent and observe the group's dynamics. I'm keeping an eye on everyone, especially Charlie since he was quite vocal about identifying the mafia."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
